mapper.select: select t.user_id, t.token, t.expire_time, t.update_time from sys_user_token t where t.token = #{value}
mapper.sql:
select t.user_id, t.expire_time, t.update_time, u.user_name user_name from sys_user_token t left join sys_user u on t.user_id = u.user_id where 1=1 and t.expire_time > #{params.nowDate}
and u.real_name like '%${params.name}%'
